response.overview: In "The Hunted" William has been keeping Lillian safe from people like Maxim and Chris, but when she breaks the rules and meets Josh she's risking more than her relationship. In "Devotion" Amanda falls instantly in love when she adopts Bubba from a shelter, but is there enough love to go around when she meets David? In "Maneater" his love for her is strong, but can it withstand the zombie apocalypse?
response.tagline: Three tales of love gone wrong.
response.title: Chillers 3
